item.title: IEEE International Symposium on Antennas and Propagation
item.dc:creator: Zé Vinícius
item.description:
Today I just received an awesome message. I have been contemplated with a travel grant from IEEE APS to present my paper at the IEEE APS/URSI conference which will be held in Puerto Rico! :)

My paper is about a derivation of a new envelope-phase joint density function for the exponentiated-Weibu ...READ MORE...

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2016
item.dc:creator: Zé Vinícius
item.description:
This year I'm applying to the Google Summer of Code under the Astropy community. I'm in the process of preparing my proposal, and potential mentors are actually taking a look at it.

Shortly, my proposal concerns the issue of fitting point spread functions (PSF) to crowded fields (i. e., a image ...READ MORE...
